title: Login to Ticketing Admin Site
custom_preconds:
Given Enter this url into webrowser 
Ticketing Admin URL Link : >> https://qa-ticketing-admin.bamgrid.com/ticketing-admin/vadin/HomePage
custom_steps:
WHEN Enter UN and P 
AND click 'Enter key' (on the keyboard) or click 'Submit' button
custom_expected: THEN User should able to login to Ticketing Admin successfully

title: Verify Offer Page without entering anything
custom_steps:
WHEN 
Scroll down at the bottom of page and click ’Save Offer’ button.
custom_expected:
THEN
User gets pop up message… 'Please select sport code'

title: Verify Mandatory Fields
custom_steps: WHEN Click ‘Save Offer Group’ at the bottom of page
custom_expected:
THEN Following are mandatory fields and it shows 'red !' next to box.
* Sport
* League
* Team
* Offer Group Name
* Offer Pricing Plan
* Offer Group Status

title: Verify 'Display In:' Only checked 5 boxes by default
custom_steps: WHEN scroll down until you see ‘Display In’
custom_expected:
THEN 
Verify that ‘Display In’ checked 5 boxes by default.  
PROMOTIONS
SCHEDULE
ATBAT
MOBILE
SINGLEGAME

title: Verify ‘Select All’ check all boxes when clicked
custom_steps:
WHEN scroll down until you see ’Select All’
AND click ’Select All’ link
custom_expected:
THEN 
Verify that when user clicks ’Select All’ link it checks all the boxes and also opens up ’Spanish Characters’ box on the right side 
PROMOTIONS
SCHEDULE
ATBAT
MOBILE
SINGLGAME
PRMO_WIDGET
GAMEDAY_EVENTS
TIXGRID
SPANISH
GOOGLEADS

title: Verify ‘DeSelect All’ uncheck all boxes when clicked
custom_steps:
WHEN scroll down until you see ’DeSelect All’
AND click ’DeSelect All’ link
custom_expected:
THEN 
Verify that when user clicks ’DeSelect All’ link it uncheck all the boxes 
PROMOTIONS
SCHEDULE
ATBAT
MOBILE
SINGLGAME
PRMO_WIDGET
GAMEDAY_EVENTS
TIXGRID
SPANISH
GOOGLEADS

title: Verify T-Link Detail Info Section
custom_steps:
WHEN scroll down until you see ’T-Link Detail Info’ link
AND Drill down T-Link Detail Info link
custom_expected:
THEN 
Verify that three tabs display
Wired
Spanish
Mobile

title: Verify Promotion Detail Information Section
custom_steps:
WHEN Scroll down until you see ’Promotion Detail Information’ link
AND Drill down Promotion Detail Information link
custom_expected:
THEN 
Verify that two tabs display
Wired
Spanish

title: Verify Promotion Type Field
custom_expected:
THEN  Verify Promotion Type field display total 14 categories in Asc order
Bobblehead
Cap
Concert
Day of Game Highlight
Figurine
Fireworks
Food
Historical (replica ring, HOF ceremony,etc)
Kids/Family Days
Misc.Giveaway
Shirt
Sponsor
Theme Days
Ticket Offer

title: Verify Offer Type field
custom_expected:
THEN  Verify Offer Type field display total 6 categories in Asc order
At Bat Check-in Offer
Day of Game Highlight
Giveways
Sponsorship
Theme Days
Ticket Offer

title: Verify Clear Form button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Offer>Create Page
AND Enter all required fields into the form.
custom_expected:
THEN  all data is cleared from the form
Except 'Year' should remain what ever year you have selected.
